goal.en: Understand the modern reserch trend in chemistry and practice professional presentation
goal.ch: 培養學生瞭解現代化學研究與進行專業報告之能力

content.ch: 以口頭報告和交互討論進行

grading.en: “Performance of Presentation: 50％ Abstract: 10％ Neat Slides: 20％ Attitude toward learning and asking questions: 20％“
grading.ch: “Performance of Presentation: 50％ Abstract: 10％ Neat Slides: 20％ 學習態度及發問問題: 20％“

office_hr.en: Will announed in the first class

en.competency: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Portfolios Assessment ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Portfolios Assessment ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Portfolios Assessment ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Be self-driven constantly to explore science.
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Portfolios Assessment ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

ch.competency: 具備研究領域之專業知識
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 學習檔案評量 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 學習檔案評量 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 學習檔案評量 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 自我鞭策不斷學習新知識
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 學習檔案評量 ， 自我評量/同儕互評
